# student-utils-fatima

A simple Python utility library for students.

## Modules

### math_utils
- add(a, b): Adds two numbers
- subtract(a, b): Subtracts two numbers
- multiply(a, b): Multiplies two numbers
- is_even(n): Checks if number is even

### string_utils
- reverse_string(text): Reverses a string
- to_upper(text): Converts string to uppercase
- word_count(text): Counts words
- is_palindrome(text): Checks palindrome
